amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute directs the Secretary of Transportation to issue, under an ongoing rulemaking proceeding, a rule relating to materials of trade exceptions to hazardous materials regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert a complete new text.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Petri.
The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) and on the bill without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Petri amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
